name: Green Striped and Embroidered Mixed Cotton Panjabi
description: Elevate your traditional wardrobe with this elegant Green Striped Panjabi, crafted from a breathable mixed cotton blend for all-day comfort. The subtle vertical stripes add a touch of modern flair, while the intricate embroidery along the neckline and placket showcases timeless craftsmanship. Perfect for festive occasions or casual gatherings, this Panjabi blends heritage with contemporary style.
